title: Quarkus Playpen

labels.name: area/quarkiverse

body:
### Description

Playpen allows you to do live local development on an existing deployed service in kubernetes/openshift.  Requests from a development cluster can be routed to your local dev instance instead of your deployed service.  Playpen defines a proxy, k8s operator, client, and quarkus extension to do this work.

Additionally, in future versions, we will provide an additional mode to make Quarkus Remote Dev Mode easier within kubernetes.  The service will deploy a remote dev container in the k8s cluster that can override the existing service temporarily and have requests routed to it.  The developer can then code locally using quarkus remote dev mode.
